description.@value: Mars Bar Ice Cream is a rich, indulgent dessert inspired by the famous candy bar. Mars Bars are slowly melted in cream then combined with eggs. Frozen until set, this glorious ice cream is perfect for an occasional treat - give it a go!

recipeInstructions.@value:
MAKING:





	Melt mars bars using double boiling method.

	Add whipping cream and stir occasionally until combined for 10-15 minutes.

	Turn off heat and allow to cool for 10-15 minutes.

	Add egg yolks and remaining cream.

	Fold in whipped egg white.

	Pour into ice cream tub and pop into freezer.

	Allow to freeze for 6 hours.





 



SERVING:                       





	Serve and enjoy!
